paper_title: Effect of ice nucleating proteins on the structure-property relationships of ice: A molecular dynamics study

claims.claim: The number of grains in the well-equilibrated ice structure without ice-nucleating proteins (INPs) is higher than in the structure containing two INPs
instruction: Open the final well-equilibrated microstructures W_Tr0.cfg and 2INP_Tr2.cfg in OVITO
Apply the Polyhedral Template Matching (PTM) modifier, enabling the cubic diamond and hexagonal diamond structure templates
Apply the Grain Segmentation modifier using the PTM structure and orientation information to identify individual grains
Verify that the total number of grains is approximately 437 for W_Tr0.cfg and approximately 94 for 2INP_Tr2.cfg
